title: Test double
content:
Test double,类似于stunt double(替身),主要功能是为了在测试中替代真实的dependency.

### 定义

Test double有很多种,根据[这个链接](https://martinfowler.com/bliki/TestDouble.html)一共有下面五种:

* Dummy: 主要为了填parameter list.除此之外并不会被用到.
* Fake: 往往是有一个working implementation,但是这个实现比现实中的会简化不少.
* Stub: 如果被叫到某些method,会返回一些预先设定的值.
* Spy: 是一种stub,但是会记录calls.
* Mock: 一般会no op,主要通过call verification来验证测试结果

### State verification vs Behavior verification

简而言之, state verification验证的是最终的状态,并不在意是怎么到达的这个状态.
而behavior verification验证是被测试class跟其他collaborators的交互.

Test double里只有mock是一直使用behavior verification的.
其他的test double既可以用behavior verification,也可以用state verification.

### Stub和Mock区别
Mock在测试跑之前会预先set up一些expectation,而在测试后会验证这些expectation.

_ref:_
* https://martinfowler.com/bliki/TestDouble.html
* https://martinfowler.com/articles/mocksArentStubs.html

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to [Hexo](https://hexo.io/)! This is your very first post. Check [documentation](https://hexo.io/docs/) for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in [troubleshooting](https://hexo.io/docs/troubleshooting.html) or you can ask me on [GitHub](https://github.com/hexojs/hexo/issues).

## Quick Start

### Create a new post

``` bash
$ hexo new "My New Post"
```

More info: [Writing](https://hexo.io/docs/writing.html)

### Run server

``` bash
$ hexo server
```

More info: [Server](https://hexo.io/docs/server.html)

### Generate static files

``` bash
$ hexo generate
```

More info: [Generating](https://hexo.io/docs/generating.html)

### Deploy to remote sites

``` bash
$ hexo deploy
```

More info: [Deployment](https://hexo.io/docs/deployment.html)
